title: Web3 Gamer: ‘Axie moment’ for Shrapnel & Star Atlas? Hit game recipe, Nine Chronicles review
description:
Pundits predict which Web3 game could see the next ‘Axie Infinity moment,’ transferable gamertags, Nine Chronicles Mobile & more. Web3 Gamer.

Securing investment will probably continue to be a challenge until we find a new breakout use case, the new Axie moment, says George Isichos, core contributor at blockchain gaming collective Game7.

Speaking to Magazine, Isichos suggests that crafting a game with the mysterious X factor, one that resonates as widely as Axie Infinity did, is a challenging task. At its peak in 2021, Axie Infinity boasted over 2.8 million daily active users.

Web3 games that gain traction seem to blend the best of traditional gaming with the novel perks of blockchain. Its not just about the technology its about how it enriches gameplay and empowers your community to play a bigger role.

Read more

title: Why are Bitcoin Ordinal Inscription tokens ORDI, SATS crashing?
description:
Inscription tokens ORDI and SATS have underperformed the broader crypto market so far in 2024 and are still showing potential for further downside.

The cryptocurrency market has seen a notable drop in several digital assets in January, with Inscription tokens (aka BRC-20 tokens) like ORDI and SATS among the most affected.

The reasons behind the underperformance of these unique tokens include several other important factors in addition to Bitcoin's (BTC) recent price fluctuations.

Notably, the price of ORDI and SATS have fallen by approximately 34.50% and 50%, respectively, so far in 2024.

Read more

title: Bitcoin miner balances hit 18-month low amid wallet reorganization signals
description:
Quick Take In an intriguing turn of events, the total Bitcoin supply held in miner addresses has dipped to a level not observed since August 2021. Miner balances hold approximately 1.187 million Bitcoin, marking a significant departure of 15k BTC since Oct. 2023. These changes, however, do not necessarily indicate that miners are offloading their […]

title: Space and Time Propels ZK Proofs with Open-Source GPU Accelerator
description: AI-powered decentralized data warehouse Space and Time announced the launch of an open-source version of Blitzar,  its GPU accelerator framework for zero-knowledge (ZK) proofs, powering proof of SQL.

title: Tesla is a Bitcoin Believer: Company Holds Strong with 9,720 BTC in Q4 2023, No Changes Reported
description: In its latest earnings report, Tesla revealed that it held onto its Bitcoin reserves without engaging in any transactions during the entire fourth quarter of 2023.
